headline: The Top 5 Analyst Questions From IDEX’s Q1 Earnings Call
summary: IDEX’s first quarter results were well received by the market, with both revenue and adjusted earnings surpassing Wall Street expectations. Management credited this performance to resilient demand across core end markets such as space, defense, municipal water, and fire and safety, alongside steady order rates and backlog growth.
